title: 6 Hot Music Trends to Discover at Billboard Latin Music Week 2025
summary: The buzziest Latin genres that go beyond the ever so popular reggaetón and música Mexicana.
body: The 2025 Billboard Latin Music Week is gearing up for one of its most promising years with over 30 panels and more than 100 guests, including today’s most relevant artists, executives and content creators. Returning to The Fillmore Miami Beach from Oct. 20 to 24, Latin Music Week is the single most important and largest gathering of Latin artists and industry executives in the world. This year’s event will once again host panels, marquee conversations, roundtables, networking and activations, in addition to its celebrated Billboard En Vivo showcases. Latin Music Week will also coincides with the 2025 Billboard Latin Music Awards, set to air Thursday, Oct. 23, on Telemundo and Peacock. This year’s star-studded lineup includes Aitana, Alofoke, Anuel AA, Bebeshito, Carlos Vives, Carín León, Danny Ocean, DJ Khaled, Daddy Yankee (DY), Emilia Mernes, Ivy Queen, Gloria Estefan, Grupo 5, Kapo, Laura Pausini, Luck Ra, Netón Vega, Olga Tañón, Óscar Maydon, Ozuna, Pablo Alborán, Rawayana, Suzette Quintanilla, Tokischa, Xavi and Yailin La Más Viral, to name a few. “We are super-excited, we are 36 years old,” Leila Cobo, chief content officer of Billboard Latin/Español, said at the invit…

title: From Beats and Legos to Adidas – Ace Gift-Shopping for Your Girlfriend With This Guide
summary: From birthdays to anniversaries, we've got you covered.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Gifting is hard, especially for your loved ones . There’s always so much pressure to snag that perfect piece for the special someone in your life that strikes a balance between sentiment and affordability. While we can’t all be as extravagant as Travis Kelce’s reported 35 bouquets of flowers gifted to his boo, Taylor Swift , or as interesting as Benny Blanco’s bathtub filled with nacho cheese for Selena Gomez, we can still make gifting choices that will, at the very least, make that special someone smile. To help you along your gifting journey, we at ShopBillboard have compiled a list of products to shop for your girlfriend, although these gifts are great for just about anyone, and we’re hoping you’ll get inspired at the very least. Keep reading to shop our favorite picks from top brands such as Baggu, Jellycat, FP Movement, Ouai and Beats, among a slew of others. Damson Madder Antonella Cotton Pajama Set $155 Buy…

title: Nate Bargatze’s ‘Big Dumb Eyes’ Tour: How to Get Affordable Tickets Online
summary: The comedian is on the road across the United States and Canada in 2025 and 2026.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Fresh off the heels of hosting the Primetime Emmy Awards and breaking records for sold out arena shows , comedian Nate Bargatze is on the road for the rest of 2025 and well into 2026 for his “Big Dumb Eyes” tour . In fact, dates go until Saturday (Aug. 15, 2026) at Scotiabank Arena in Toronto, Canada, while his last tour date in the United States will take place the day prior (Aug. 14, 2026) at Little Caesars Arena in Detroit, Michigan. Tickets to the tour first went on sale through Ticketmaster , while the retailer’s Face Value Exchange program is an option for fans to resell tickets. Shop Nate Bargatze Tickets at Ticketmaster Since many of the dates have either sold out or are very close to selling out, one of the best ways to find Nate Bargatze tickets online is through third-party sites, including StubHub , Vivid Seats , SeatGeek and others — all of which guarantee authentic tickets in time for the event. In addition, tickets a…

title: Selena Gomez Looks Back on ‘Revival’ Era 10 Years Later: ‘I Had Bangs & Thought I Was a Rockstar’
summary: The project spawned some of the pop star's biggest hits to date.
body: Selena Gomez is reviving one of her older albums in honor of its 10-year anniversary. On Thursday (Oct. 9), the singer-actress celebrated one decade of her 2015 LP Revival , sharing a carousel of photos from that era of her life on Instagram . “Happy 10 YEARS of my album Revival!!!” she wrote. Related Wait, What? Selena Gomez’s ‘Wizards of Waverly Place’ Reboot Drops Shocking Plot Twist for Alex Russo Taylor Swift Freaks Out Over Selena Gomez’s Bridal Glam in Adorable Wedding Video: ‘Look at Her!’ Benny Blanco Calls New Bride Selena Gomez His ‘Real Life Disney Princess’ in Loving Message “The year was 2015, I had bangs and thought I was a rockstar,” she continued. “What a time!! Thank you for those who have sang to every song with me and for making that chapter of my life so memorable!! LOVE YOU.” In one of the throwback photos, Gomez sits on a kitchen island underneath balloon letters spelling out “Revival.” Other snaps show the artist performing on stage and posing with fans while on her Revival Tour in 2016. In honor of the project’s anniversary, Gomez also share…

title: Are You a Good Witch or a Bad Witch? Shop ‘Wicked’ Halloween Costumes For Under $60 on Amazon
summary: You can channel your inner witch without breaking the bank.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Halloween is almost upon us, which means now is the right time to snag your costume. While there are so many costume routes to choose from, it’s never a bad idea to take the timely pop culture route, like a Wicked costume. If you’re feeling witchy, there are plenty of costumes inspired by the film available right now on Amazon for both the Glinda and or Elphaba in your life. The best part? They’re all under $60. To help you pick the perfect costume for you, we’ve compiled a few of our favorites for both adults and kids that you can shop below.
